data.message: Your last 2 freestyles are so scatter brained maybe it's time you realized how lucky you really are. Your last albums are trash. Maybe you and Kathy Griffin can file joint complaints when you see your sales fall flat. Unfollowing. What a shame.

replies.message: Wow I can tell you fuck dudes in the ass.😂😂😂😂😂😂

It seems to me you're never really a fan to begin with. Cos if you are, you'd know the things Em's been through, and why his style changed a bit from his earlier albums. You'd understand he did say he felt lucky cos most people don't get a second chance like he did. And he talks about it in a lot of his more recent songs, too, he even admits he hated one of his recent albums. :-/
Does being mean to people bring happiness to you or something?
No but I hate ignorance. He only did this because he's got an album dropping next month and he's been doing worse and worse the more he changes his style. He sounded bad and was super unoriginal.
